name: Bloxs
description:
Bloxs is a 3rd person 3D platformer game where your goal is to collect as many coins as possible to win a house. A game with a mix of low ploy and stylized art. Have fun with this platformer that will challenge you with its simple controls. In the dream like atmosphere score big on your way to your goal!



Adventure through 6 levels.
3 challenge stages.
Fun and creative music through the game.
Avoid the enemy Boxes!
Discover what house you can win!
